price: Ese agahombo n’ukwicuza vy’akataraboneka bizoshikira abagararije ku musi w’izuka, igihe biboneye ibihano ukuri kwamye! Ntibashikirwa n’Intumwa n’imwe irungitswe n’Imana Allah, kiretse ko bayiteburako bakayisuzugura.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
